title: Fomoin_Official

content: We are excited to announce the partnership with HyperMove â€” the worldâ€™s first blockchain powered mobile app with built in integration of M2E & P2E that allows users to earn in a decentralized environment.https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/0*hzSxXVneKOk2cmpjAbout HyperMove:Built on the BSC network, HyperMove app provides you a sea of opportunities to convert your daily activities into real world cash as well as earn by playing blockchain powered games online.HyperMove Mission ðŸŽ¯âœ…HyperMove exists with a primary mission â€” To integrate P2E & M2E into a single app where users would have to freedom to earn as they move as well as earn as they play exciting games. ðŸ’°ðŸš€âœ…HyperMove intends to promote both mental and physical health by providing a platform capable of encouraging users to exercise, improve their fitness and play games all while earning cryptocurrencies as passive rewards.HyperMoveâ€™s Key FeaturesðŸ”¹Play-to-Earn â€” HyperMove aims to provide all the eligible and interested gamers around the world an additional opportunity to earn cryptocurrencies passively as they game in a decentralised environment.ðŸ”¹Move-to-Earn â€” HyperMove, through its platform would offer tremendous opportunities for users to earn as they exercise by just logging into the app before doing their daily activities.$HyperMove Token DetailsðŸ’°Token Name: ðŸš€ HyperMoveðŸ’Ž Symbol: $hmoveTGE: TBAInitial Mcap : 109,200Learn more about HyperMoveWebsite | Twitter | Telegram | Medium | PitchDeck | WhitepaperAbout FomoinFomoin, a launchpad and a free source that presents the worldâ€™s most current and comprehensive cryptocurrency airdrops. Fomoin collects comprehensive and up-to-date information about blockchain projects and their fundraising information. By building a relationship network between projects and investors, Fomoin provides an effective channel for the project information display and communication.Learn more about FomoinWebsite | Twitter | Telegram | Medium

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.The board you made this thread is Bitcoin discussion so you published your topic in a wrong board.A correct board for this thread is Tokens (Atlcoins). You don't have to create a new thread in that board because having duplicate threads in different boards is not allowed.You can move your thread (this one) to Tokens (Altcoins) board. Move topic button at bottom left.From the username, I think you are official representative of that project and you must post with images. You must have a rank at least Junior member to post image (requires to receive 1 merit to rank up). Another way, faster to post image is buying the Copper membership: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2385104.msg24371150#msg24371150
